# up

**Type Property**

The touch moves upward.

## Declaration

```swift
static var up: WKSwipeGestureRecognizerDirection { get }
```

## Constants

- **right**: The touch moves from left to right. This direction is the default.
- **left**: The touch moves from right to left.
- **down**: The touch moves downward.

items.description: The touch moves from left to right. This direction is the default.
items.name: right

items.description: The touch moves from right to left.
items.name: left
